pages.text: The 3 main hud displays. $(#FF3333)Might$() $(o)(red orb), $()$(#33FFFF)Spirit $(o)(Blue orb) and $()Posture and status $(o)(bi-directional meter)$(br2)Pressing $(k:wardance.combat) activates and deactivates combat mode.
pages.title: Combat Mode: Hud

pages.text: To utilize a number of features $(o)(and also as precaution of accidental misfires of such mechanics)$() you must activate $(thing)"Combat mode"$(). Combat mode also allows you to see the three pictured resources constantly. $(br2)Outside of combat mode mechanics such as $(o)improved sweeping attacks, skill usage, offhand swinging and resource meter displays$() are suppressed. However Parrying and related posture mechanics will remain active (resources will also continue to restore or be contributed to as normal also despite being hidden).$(br2)
